fun with babelfish - machine translation tennis 【機械翻訳卓球】

2003-12-07

Too cute > 余りにかわいい > The excessive glue it is good > 余分な接着剤それはよい > Excessive adhesive that is good > よい余分な接着剤 > Good excessive adhesive > よく余分な接着剤 > It is good the excessive adhesive > それは余分な接着剤よい > That the excessive adhesive is good > 余分な接着剤はよいこと > The excessive adhesive is good > 余分な接着剤はよい > The excessive adhesive is good > (And there it loops, so that must have been what was meant in the first place.)
